service.readme:
# Ethereum Service

[Website](https://mesg.com/) - [Docs](https://docs.mesg.com/) - [Forum](https://forum.mesg.com) - [Blog](https://medium.com/mesg)

Ethereum Service to interact with any Smart Contract.

# Contents

- [Installation](#Installation)
- [Definitions](#Definitions)
  - [Events](#Events)
    - [Block](#Block)
 - [Log](#Log)
    - [Transaction](#Transaction)
  - [Tasks](#Tasks)
    - [Call a Smart Contract Method](#Call-a-Smart-Contract-Method)
    - [Decode Log](#Decode-Log)
    - [Execute a Smart ContractMethod](#Execute-a-Smart-Contract-Method)


# Installation

## MESG Core

This service requires [MESG Core](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core) to be install.

You can install MESG Core by running the following command or [follow the install guide](https://docs.mesg.com/guide/start-here/installation.html).

```bash
bash <(curl -fsSL https://mesg.com/install)
```

## Infura

This service is using Infura as an Ethereum Provider. Infura requires application to use a `PROJECT_ID`. Please register at https://infura.io/register to get a `PROJECT_ID` and don't forget to replace it in the following `PROVIDER_ENDPOINT` URL.

## Mainnet

To use the mainnet, deploy using the following endpoint:

```
mesg-core service deploy https://github.com/mesg-foundation/service-ethereum --env PROVIDER_ENDPOINT=https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/PROJECT_ID
```

## Ropsten (POW)

To use the ropsten testnet, deploy using the following endpoint:

```
mesg-core service deploy https://github.com/mesg-foundation/service-ethereum --env PROVIDER_ENDPOINT=https://ropsten.infura.io/v3/PROJECT_ID
```

## Rinkeby (POA)

To use the rinkeby testnet, deploy using the following endpoint:

```
mesg-core service deploy https://github.com/mesg-foundation/service-ethereum--env PROVIDER_ENDPOINT=https://rinkeby.infura.io/v3/PROJECT_ID --env BLOCK_CONFIRMATIONS=0
```

On this testnet, the number of confirmation is set to 0 because of the Proof Of Authority consensus used by this network.

## Kovan (POA)

To use the kovan testnet, deploy using the following endpoint:

```
mesg-core service deploy https://github.com/mesg-foundation/service-ethereum --env PROVIDER_ENDPOINT=https://kovan.infura.io/v3/PROJECT_ID --env BLOCK_CONFIRMATIONS=0
```

On this testnet, the number of confirmation is set to 0 because of the Proof Of Authority consensus used by this network.


## RSK Mainnet

To use the RSK mainnet, deploy using the following endpoint:

```
mesg-core service deploy https://github.com/mesg-foundation/service-ethereum --env PROVIDER_ENDPOINT=https://public-node.rsk.co --env BLOCK_CONFIRMATIONS=0
```

## RSK Testnet

To use the RSK testnet, deploy using the following endpoint:

```
mesg-core service deploy https://github.com/mesg-foundation/service-ethereum --env PROVIDER_ENDPOINT=https://public-node.testnet.rsk.co --env BLOCK_CONFIRMATIONS=0
```

## Custom

You can set any provider, block confirmations, default gas limit and polling time to match your specific need. Here is a example with those 3 configs:

```
mesg-core service deploy https://github.com/mesg-foundation/service-ethereum --env PROVIDER_ENDPOINT=AN_ETHEREUM_NODE --env BLOCK_CONFIRMATIONS=1 --env DEFAULT_GAS_LIMIT=1000000 --env POLLING_TIME=1000
```

# Definitions

# Events

## Block

Event key: `block`



| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **difficulty** | `String` |  |
| **extraData** | `String` |  |
| **gasLimit** | `Number` |  |
| **gasUsed** | `Number`|  |
| **hash** | `String` |  |
| **logsBloom** | `String` |  |
| **miner** | `String` |  |
| **number** | `Number` |  |
| **parentHash** | `String` |  |
| **sha3Uncles** | `String` |  |
| **size** | `Number` |  |
| **stateRoot** | `String` |  |
| **timestamp** | `Number` |  |

## Log

Event key: `log`



|**Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **address** | `String` |  |
| **blockHash** | `String` |  |
| **blockNumber** | `Number` |  |
| **data** | `String` |  |
| **logIndex** | `Number` |  |
| **topics** | `Any` |  |
| **transactionHash** | `String` |  |
| **transactionIndex** | `Number` |  |

## Transaction

Event key: `transaction`



| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **blockHash** | `String` |  |
| **blockNumber** | `Number` |  |
| **from** | `String` ||
| **gas** | `Number` |  |
| **gasPrice** | `String` |  |
| **gasUsed** | `Number` |  |
| **input** | `String` |  |
| **status** | `Boolean` |  |
| **to** | `String` |  |
| **transactionHash** | `String` |  |
| **transactionIndex** | `Number` |  |
| **value**| `String` |  |


# Tasks

## Call a Smart Contract Method

Task key: `callSmartContractMethod`

This task call a 'constant' method on any Smart Contract. It does not require fees.

### Inputs

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **contractAddress** | `String` | The address of the contract |
| **inputs** | `Any` | The inputs to use during the execution of the method. Pass an Object with parameter's name as key and parameter's value as value. |
| **methodAbi** | `Any` | The ABIof the method to execute. Only pass the ABI of the method and NOT all the Smart Contract's ABI. |


### Outputs

##### error

Output key: `error`

Output when an error occurs

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **message** | `String` | The error message |

##### success

Output key: `success`

Output when the task executes successfully

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **outputs** | `Any` |  |




## Decode Log

Task key: `decodeLog`



### Inputs

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **abi** | `Any` |  |
| **address** | `String` |  |
| **blockHash** | `String` |  |
| **blockNumber** | `Number` |  |
| **data** | `String` |  |
| **logIndex** | `Number` |  |
| **topics** | `Any` |  |
| **transactionHash**| `String` |  |
| **transactionIndex** | `Number` |  |


### Outputs

##### error

Output key: `error`

Output when an error occurs

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **message** | `String` | The error message |

##### success

Output key: `success`



| **Key** |**Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **address** | `String` |  |
| **blockHash** | `String` |  |
| **blockNumber** | `Number` |  |
| **data** | `String` |  |
| **decodedData** | `Any`|  |
| **logIndex** | `Number` |  |
| **topics** | `Any` |  |
| **transactionHash** | `String` |  |
| **transactionIndex** | `Number` |  |




## Execute a Smart Contract Method

Task key: `executeSmartContractMethod`

This task executes a method on any Smart Contract

### Inputs

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **contractAddress** | `String` | The address of the contract |
| **gasLimit** | `Number` | The maximum gas provided for this transaction |
| **gasPrice** | `String` | The gas price in wei to use for this transaction |
| **inputs** | `Any` | The inputs to use during the execution of the method. Pass an Object with parameter's name as key and parameter's value as value. |
| **methodAbi** | `Any` | The ABI of the method to execute. Only pass the ABI of the method and NOT all the Smart Contract's ABI. |
|**privateKey** | `String` | The private key to sign the transaction |
| **value** | `String` |  |


### Outputs

##### error

Output key: `error`

Output when an error occurs

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **message** | `String` | The error message |

##### success

Output key: `success`

Output when the task executes successfully

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **transactionHash** | `String` | Hash of the transaction |

| **methodAbi** | `Any` | TheABI of the method to execute. Only pass the ABI of the method and NOT all the Smart Contract's ABI. |

## Execute a Smart Contract Method

Task key: `executeSmartContractMethod`

This task executes a method on any Smart Contract

### Inputs

| **Key** | **Type** |**Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **contractAddress** | `String` | The address of the contract |
| **gasLimit** | `Number` | Themaximum gas provided for this transaction |
| **gasPrice** | `String` | The gas price in wei to use for this transaction |
| **inputs** |`Any` | The inputs to use during the execution of the method. Pass an Object with parameter's name as key and parameter's value as value. |
| **methodAbi** | `Any` | The ABI of the method to execute. Onlypass the ABI of the method and NOT all the Smart Contract's ABI. |
| **privateKey** | `String` | The private key to sign the transaction|
| **value** | `String` |  |


### Outputs

##### error

Output key: `error`

Output when an error occurs

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **message** | `String` | The error message |

##### success

Output key: `success`

Output when the task executes successfully

| **Key** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **transactionHash** | `String` | Hash of the transaction |
